pros: A new brand built out of established business provides an air of excitement as a marketer. The team seems to be excited to build something and put their stamp on the new brand. Communications Collaboration Compassion These are the words that come to mind when I think about what my team does well. We work very well together and the company tends to lead with compassion. There is an understanding that we are humans first and that goes a long way in building good work/life balance. I feel like my voice is valued. I feel that because it has been overtly stated in leadership meetings and followed through with in leadership action. Good things are coming!
cons: Building a team always has challenges at the beginning as you work to understand the new status quo. There are lots of new people to build comradery with. There's the challenge of bringing new people on board while moving everything else forward. But growing pains are inevitable at this stage of company life.

pros: Matching 401k, Cafeteria on site, beautiful building

job_title: Chief Financial Officer CFO in Logan, WV
pros: Hospitals are always needed, so they will be around.
cons: The only focus is cost cutting. Very unstable.
